column2: Tuberose,Enigmatic and beguiling,this heady flower deploys its captivating sensuality at dusk
Lavender Leaf, Evoking fresh leaves and sweet flowers, it is an invitation to calm and harmony
Wood Fire, This sophisticated blend of rare woods recalls the crackling of an open fire, Warm and familiar during the winter days
Fig Tree, Related to the eau de toilette Philosykos, it intensifies the tree's qualities, the warmth of the bark, the freshness of the leaves, and the milky sap of its fruit
Quince, The comforting, autumnal, luscious scent of delicious quince jelly being made in the kitchen
